name: SnakeBird NES
description:
This is my entry for Retro Jam 2021. I remade Snakebird game for NES gaming platform.

Original game : https://store.steampowered.com/app/357300/Snakebird/

Side Effect - As this is converted to NES version,  NES games are notorious for being hard, so there are no undo steps in this Snakebird demake, and if you're stuck you can kill the snakebird.

🎮 CONTROLS 

MovementArrows , WSADSelectZDestroy SnakebirdX

CREDITS

🕹️ PROGRAMING AND ART
